channel.title: HElP? Reduce Server LAG?
channel.description: Hi, im experiancing Some server Lag ( i Host it) i dont know why Lag its like when u Turn the camera it Moves Stops Bit by bit ?? Anyway to fix the LAG?

item.title: HElP? Reduce Server LAG?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Most likely your computer. Make sure you leave minimal things running, if you are using a slower computer.

If it is not your server, go threw your files and delete useless crap.

Makglobalobject, deleteglobalobject, npc.cfg Deleting things from those files will reduce lag, I had to recently do that to mine. When you start coding your server you will also find stuff that you donâ€™t need or use, so then you can delete that stuff as-well.

Read full topic
